title: fathafraink
author: fathafraink
content: Ok Guys, Here I will show you the shortcut how to Mine Pepe Pow Coins on GPU, and I'm using Gtx 1660 Ti Mobile.Requirements :- Mining Pools : https://mining4people.com/pool/pepecoin-pplns- Software - SRB Miner : https://github.com/doktor83/SRBMiner-Multi/releases/download/2.2.8/SRBMiner-Multi-2-2-8-win64.zip  ( I'm using Win64 )- $PepeW Wallet Address ( here is the video how to install Pepe Pow Wallet : https://youtu.be/2EhYV1ucyHY )Step 1- Open SRBMiner.zip and Extract all of it to a Folder ( You can create the folder anywhere you Like ), then create file with the name of "start" (in the same folder of SRBMinerMulti.exe) by using extension of ".bat" , so it will be "Start.bat"Step 2- Edit the file of "start.bat" and Copy these :SRBMiner.exe --disable-cpu --algorithm memehash --pool stratum+tcp://fi.mining4people.com:4176 --wallet PXsFhCZbdY4CkwxKkhGWE6TxkqYPMCem8L --password xStep 3- Change/Replace the current Address "PXsFhCZbdY4CkwxKkhGWE6TxkqYPMCem8L " to be Yours (Your Address), and then Save the file (Ctrl+S)-  Start the Mining by Double Click / Left Click the "start.bat" Twice. And it's all Done. Here is the image :Note : You Should change file name of "SRBMiner-Multi.exe" to be "SRBMiner.exe"

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: fathafraink on June 07, 2023, 10:41:24 AMOk Guys, Here I will show you the shortcut how to Mine Pepe Pow Coins on GPU, and I'm using Gtx 1660 Ti Mobile.How much do you earn per day? Do you pay for electricity yourself?Why are you torturing your laptop for 5 cents of profit per day?https://miningpoolstats.stream/pepepowOpen the first link with a large pool and you will find a good instruction with ready-made bat file settings.https://mining4people.com/pool/pepecoin-pplns

comments.author: fathafraink
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on June 07, 2023, 08:16:06 PMQuote from: fathafraink on June 07, 2023, 10:41:24 AMOk Guys, Here I will show you the shortcut how to Mine Pepe Pow Coins on GPU, and I'm using Gtx 1660 Ti Mobile.How much do you earn per day? Do you pay for electricity yourself?Why are you torturing your laptop for 5 cents of profit per day?https://miningpoolstats.stream/pepepowOpen the first link with a large pool and you will find a good instruction with ready-made bat file settings.https://mining4people.com/pool/pepecoin-pplnsI'm not really mining this coin, because I aware of overheat on my laptop.But, one of bitcointalk.org member already try to mine it, He is using RTX 3060 and get 31 MH/s, and comsume 100W of Electricity Power ( https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5455593.msg62369828#msg62369828 )Fyi : $PepeW has been listed on Txbit Market, and we can check here : https://txbit.io/Trade/PEPEW/USDT

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: fathafraink on June 08, 2023, 01:00:03 AMI'm not really mining this coin, because I aware of overheat on my laptop.But, one of bitcointalk.org member already try to mine it, He is using RTX 3060 and get 31 MH/s, and comsume 100W of Electricity Power ( https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5455593.msg62369828#msg62369828 )Fyi : $PepeW has been listed on Txbit Market, and we can check here : https://txbit.io/Trade/PEPEW/USDTUsing the RTX 3060 means additional costs, but in general, how much can you give 31 MH/s? In other words, is the return profitable, or is it a waste of time in return for consuming resources.I see that the currency has a good number of users, and perhaps it is an opportunity for the short term, especially since the coming months may mean an increase in the price, but if it is not profitable now, even a little, it will not be so in the future.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: fathafraink on June 08, 2023, 01:00:03 AMQuote from: FP91G on June 07, 2023, 08:16:06 PMQuote from: fathafraink on June 07, 2023, 10:41:24 AMOk Guys, Here I will show you the shortcut how to Mine Pepe Pow Coins on GPU, and I'm using Gtx 1660 Ti Mobile.How much do you earn per day? Do you pay for electricity yourself?Why are you torturing your laptop for 5 cents of profit per day?https://miningpoolstats.stream/pepepowOpen the first link with a large pool and you will find a good instruction with ready-made bat file settings.https://mining4people.com/pool/pepecoin-pplnsI'm not really mining this coin, because I aware of overheat on my laptop.But, one of bitcointalk.org member already try to mine it, He is using RTX 3060 and get 31 MH/s, and comsume 100W of Electricity Power ( https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5455593.msg62369828#msg62369828 )Fyi : $PepeW has been listed on Txbit Market, and we can check here : https://txbit.io/Trade/PEPEW/USDTPEPE has been a good coin to mine for a few days. Today, the NVIDIA RTX 3060 graphics card will earn 7 cents a day at 6 cents per kilowatt. If the video card is in the computer, then mining will not bring profit, and this will be useless work of the PC. It's good that PEPE is traded on exchanges, but it's bad that mining the coin is unprofitable.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on June 14, 2023, 08:08:18 PMPepePow developer writes on DiscordIt did not take much time before it appeared to us that mining by GPU became a thing of the past, and perhaps it is good that when Bitcoin could be mined in a simple way, there was no technical interest in how to exploit it more than an interest in making profits.The community now has a lot of knowledge and mining by GPU will centralize the currency in the hands of large platforms away from the basic idea of the developer.This news bounced negatively on the price, although I expect the price to rise as long as Binance did not think of de listing of that currency, perhaps a rise for one last time.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on June 15, 2023, 03:53:34 AMThis news bounced negatively on the price, although I expect the price to rise as long as Binance did not think of de listing of that currency, perhaps a rise for one last time.Pepe token is traded on the binance exchangehttps://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/pepe/https://www.binance.com/en/price/pepePepepow  (PEPEW) is a coin that can be mined on video cards.It is easy to make a mistake because of the same names.https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/pepepow/https://pepecore.com/Algorithm : memehashSubsidy halving interval: 129600 blocks (each 1 months)The main news on this coin is in the discord, the developer does not have time for twitter.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: https://xeggex.com/market/PEPE2_USDTScam token made almost 90x in 4 daysAnother good price increasehttps://xeggex.com/market/PEPEW_USDTIf you have these coins left over from mining, then you can profitably sell some of the coins, but do not sell all of them. Such shitcoins can still surprise.
